extendedInfo.description: **Root is required for this app to work**NEW! Conquer Beach 2 tracks!!Bike Race Records Free app allows you to download and race the fastest level ghosts for âBike Race Free â Top Free Gamesâ (and Pro). If you have a rooted Android device, install this app, download the fastest level ghosts, and youâll be able to race the fastest Bike Race records for each level and each bike. You can also create backups of your best races. You can view the fastest Bike Race times at BikeRaceRecords.com. Features:- Download and Apply the fastest ghosts for any bike (Ultra, Zombie, Normal, Ghost, Acrobatic, Hog, Super, and Kids).- Backup and Restore your own records to external storage. (Files are backed up to /sdcard/BikeRaceRecords/ folder, 6 backup slots available).- Delete your current ghost files.
